title: Need to send my pixel 3 to service centre for warranty. Guide me to 1 in Dubai or Singapore?
content: the screen some times stops. becomes unresponsive. its in warranty. and in chat with google they says i should return it to reseller so that he can give me a new device but the reseller does not know how he will return it to google for device replacement. Can any one please guide me to a Service Centre or a warranty Centre in Dubai or Singapore
